program.name: IO-Socket-SSL
program.test:
gmake test
# ignore test failures if PRNGD not running :
program.uninstall:
_installsitearch=$(${SB_VAR_PERL}/bin/perl -e \ 'use Config; print $Config{"installsitearch"} . "\n";')
cat ${_installsitearch}/auto/IO/Socket/SSL/.packlist |\ while read _file; do rm ${_file}
_dir=$(dirname ${_file}) test -d ${_dir} && rmdir ${_dir} 2>/dev/null done
rm ${_installsitearch}/auto/IO/Socket/SSL/.packlist rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/IO/Socket/SSL rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/IO/Socket 2>/dev/null rmdir ${_installsitearch}/auto/IO 2>/dev/null
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ /head2.*L<IO::Socket::SSL|/,/back/ { g N d }" ${_installsitearch}/perllocal.pod
